dct_title_s: Tabula geographica, in qua Paradisus, nec non regiones, urbes, oppida, et loca describuntur
dct_description_sm: Map appears as inset, surrounded by pictorial vignettes depicting scenes from Genesis, including the Garden of Eden.
Dutch title: Geographische beschryvinge des Paradys, oft Luft-hofs Heden, metgaders der landen, Steden en plaetsen, der welcker vermelt word int boeck der Scheppinge.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
